snippet: BERNSTEIN--Irving. Beloved husband of Phyllis. Devoted father of Barbara and Steven. Loving grandfather of six, and great-grandfather of nine. Services Sunday 12pm at RiversideNassau North Chapel, Great Neck, NY....
lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Irving. Beloved husband of Phyllis. Devoted father of Barbara and Steven. Loving grandfather of six, and great-grandfather of nine. Services Sunday 12pm at RiversideNassau North Chapel, Great Neck, NY.
